file.name: base.yml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.3"
info:
  title: Recursive cyclic refs example
  version: "1.0"
components:
  schemas:
    Foo:
      properties:
        foo2:
          $ref: "other.yml#/components/schemas/Foo2"
        bar:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Bar"
    Bar:
      properties:
        foo:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Foo"
